title: AMU Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for Senior Project Associate Posts
description: The Aligarh Muslim University (AMU) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Senior Project Associate Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, MD/MS, Pharm D, and Post-graduation can apply for the AMU Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, ...
